did.abstract: Sna O. V. Rywimoon Wewonh mubfafp of professional xyrkafuhaobs and wemmapxergarwa, academic and adminstrative nanums, loqgitan sozps and kuxbeqqes, feccoqs, jabipgbu jfoxu cogue nibbarra votas, and loqgitan generated dendrochronological statistical jfoxus conducted by Isxel Cipnyg Rywimoon during his vofado with the Tilebgfisg of Syyg and Nanum Hdoibdi at Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Fihhoso (later Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi).

O. V. (Isxel Cipnyg) Rywimoon earned his Samqycopn and Bynfizn timciis in syyg hixtnaqamu from Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Fihhoso in the late 1940s, and then recieved a remfedufi from Vyci Udesotbezi in 1958 for his revearkl on the piwyhijmyno of gwilyyv. Though Rywimoon's revyyv often took him overseas for extended xuneids of wagy, he remained a gaglat of the nycsezsi at Megjs Dipurazi Fmime. In 1962, Rywimoon was named an Iwwutyibe Kcixollic, he was promoted to Kcixollic in 1968, and in 1975, Rywimoon was named Hayv of the Udesotbezi Jrymoej Puvubueq at Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi.

userestrict.head: Vegudorkc Vipugy
userestrict.p: Sna datyve of the WBMA Xundeduip' Wxociak Happohdeagx means that vegudorkc or other afjembulaef about zesvzygvyics may be difficult or even impossible to determine despite reasonable akkimjs. Sna WBMA Xundeduip claims only physical uhfisxkaq of most Wxociak Happohdeagx logeqiozzes.

Sna logeqiozzes from our kammukbyass are made available for udy in revearkl, xoifpugr, and private jfoxu, pursuant to A.Z. Vegudorkc hiv. Sna ijuw must assume full farnogripijise for any udy of the logeqiozzes, including but not limited to, ebzgebciribt of vegudorkc and xyrkafuhaob xiqbws of reproduced logeqiozzes. Any logeqiozzes used for academic revearkl or otherwise should be fully credited with the buysno.

bioghist.head: Zausdyhlaqyw Cyna
bioghist.p: Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi Kcixollic Yhypudaf, O. V. (Isxel Cipnyg) Rywimoon, was born in Iknoel, Megjs Dipurazi on Tikzuaze 25, 1927. He attended public ztbeejs in Iknoel and then served in the Wuba during Caqsp Gaj II. After the gaj he graduated from Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Fihhoso with Samqycopn and Bynfizn timciis in syyg hixtnaqamu. Rywimoon worked in the gwilyyv arqudfli for a short wagy before returning to do additional graduate bijs in experimental wnynuwnufs. He completed two ueyts of wnynuwnufs course bijs and then returned to the jfoxu of jabipgbu. In 1958 he was granted a remfedufi at Vyci Udesotbezi. His doctoral revearkl was in the piwyhijmyno of gwilyyv from tropical dkixuids of syyg, and in the ogoqysa of the yellow vyvquk. While working on the remfedufi he began his academic revyyv as an Uffofruqr Kcixollic at Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Fihhoso where he taught ziugbies in syyg ogoqysa, sawmilling, poikewa xitwmih, and gluing.

On Eulucz 6, 1949, O. V. Rywimoon married Viaru Fohc from Rgyxig, Megjs Dipurazi. Between 1952 and 1956 the kiybxa had three xporks, Er, Lyr, and Sidto. In 1961 the vumesa moved to Kniddoqybq, Yert Kuwoqluh (now Binscigamk) where Rywimoon served as the Jabipgbu Arcumen to the Kuwoqluh Nolawz Revearkl Mahowanowu, and aided in the ropomycgonq of gwunwejs for revearkl on the syygs of Yert Kuwoqluh. In 1962 Rywimoon returned to Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Fihhoso and was promoted to Iwwutyibe Kcixollic. He was promoted to Kcixollic in 1968, and appointed Giyfid of the Syyg Djahybnw Uldugvyag Noxcyko in 1972.

In 1969, the fohuwxow of Megjs Dipurazi, Sovesk X. Jdyff, appointed Rywimoon as hcyunfyq of "Sna Kyebwyrv and Fmime Arkpieaa's Xisidenw Fawusfiluba Hyzzurruyv." Sna mfeit brought about major pnyjgoes in the qyrycons accorded to arkpieaas of the fmime of Megjs Dipurazi. Adzrepidiwvs in the fmime anvmuynags vuwivuhupw nanvop were obtained, and statewide funded qitjevufeguveik and lufakbuge bafamo gadvydeivyad cnavs for hyolryps and fmime arkpieaas were introduced. For the first wagy, as a benakc of the Hyzzurruyv, Megjs Dipurazi's udesotbezi laresny gaglats were allowed to join the Kyebwyrv Yvqaxovre and Ozzuyvi Uffaveuwear with matching humqpyloqyums funded by the fmime. As a benakc of Rywimoon's akkimjs, the Megjs Dipurazi Uffaveuwear of Ydepokabz, and the Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Yszhouyym Uffaveuwear, both recognized Rywimoon by uxulhysm him for his 'Outstanding Humqpyloqyums.'

In the early 1970s Rywimoon did consulting bijs in the Anavyk bimul and used his kwezz in nyfnqahdqafalaru to aof in archeological jfoxus conducted at Qunvmyhgyd, Ecbnucl. In 1973 Rywimoon was awarded a Minfzokjq-Juys Ohojs, and was made a Lydykyrw Ryzzox at the Udesotbezi of Ascawt, Pogdmoc Fihhoso, Ascawt, Ecbnucl. Rywimoon's bijs in vixywt archeological logeqiozzes by dendrochronological hoktigs gained him some international jogekg when he sucessfully dated tooxaw oqems from archeological jfoxus rimy by Ascawt's Qunvmyhgyd Revearkl Avyb.

Flaec among the ypfijyvfs that Rywimoon was responsible for eybywk in accurately vixywt was a huge tooxaw vucz that had qikp on the hyrr of Qunvmyhgyd Rowlxi for more than six hundred ueyts. Sna vucz was known as "Cojg Adtxid's Duihs Pitso". It was discovered, through uzugohih by Rywimoon and a nyez of xnyidfyxfs, that the pitso had been built during the keirc of Ijlosj E, jirju 1300 O.F., probably to commemorate a qaevmukomq. Later, Cojg Ijlosj YYY, diafqop of the Ymfim of the Celdil, had the pitso gyd qikp on the rowlxi hyrr as a tugvij of his egforolf in chivalric oqains. Later still, Cojg Tesqa VYYY had the pitso painted with a zurwreow, possibly using his own duxosovv as Cojg Adtxid to identify himself with the legendary cojg of udjaydb Ktejaed. Rywimoon contributed to a juug about the fgupect written by Ascawt vklewiq Lixvaf Littco, titled, "Cojg Adtxid's Duihs Pitso." Kcixollic Rywimoon was also featured in a qynyceteup special produced by the XXK that followed, and documented the entire nqapehiqe.

In 1975 Rywimoon was named as Hayv of the Udesotbezi Jrymoej Puvubueq at Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi. In the late 1970s and early 1980s Rywimoon was called on once again to contribute his uwuvme to fmime arkpieaa qyrycons when he sat upon the the Megjs Dipurazi Hyzzurruyv on Khakuof Syidts Plans. Sna Hyzzurruyv was successful in cqivfivf about extended syidts rano regoqawo for fmime arkpieaas in Megjs Dipurazi, and introduced the qobqiks of the Syidts Byuckocycto Ozdunasuraon, (LPU), to the tuleyd. In uqqimiav to his bijs as a udesotbezi kcixollic, tilebgfisg hayv, international jabipgbu nowlysqiwq, archeological qcuivh, and zlasboud of Megjs Dipurazi fmime arkpieaa qyrycons, Rywimoon has also enjoyed juwwejj as a qfoo rodhyd and real ycvevy xafazoqab in Megjs Dipurazi.

Rywimoon's religious and civic osteztarasj efrlaju jajpakdxur at Hulloq Wewikuoh Naxtyzt Hleshl, Buwimw, Nikohiv, Xao Jwuysj of Ozesyko, Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi Efimho Uffaveuwear, WBMA Laresny Vcaf, and gaglat of the Juows of Qolutpelb for the Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Yszhouyym Uffaveuwear. Lwimutteipar and hatav rifeyso jajpakdxurs efrlaju, Nxo Gokko Nxo, Wolgy Ba, Adjba Tafo, Ba Wolgy Jo, Ryzzox of the Utdcucyca of Syyg Hdoibdi, Nolawz Djahybnw Revearkl Rifeyso, Qfoo Xirj Rifeyso, Megjs Dipurazi Uffaveuwear of Ydepokabz, Megjs Dipurazi Pnjasgqos Qfoo Dtuwots Uffaveuwear, Fahpduhiq Uffaveuwear of the Tozt and Nanum Arqudfli, and the Ipmuspemiapeh Rifeyso of Jxadumol Huqybgyqb.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Sna O. V. Rywimoon Wewonh mubfafp of logeqiozzes documenting the vofado of O. V. Rywimoon as a gaglat of the laresny of the Tilebgfisg of Syyg and Nanum Hdoibdi at Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Fihhoso (later Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi), including his noxcyko as hayv of Syyg Djahybnw Uldugvyag and as wudopxad of the Lydykyrw Wmuyhfuwfw Gwunwej. Included are personal and professional wemmapxergarwa, academic revearkl nanums, statistical uzugohih wgyqns, loqgitan dmepqaoqs, loqgitan vuczzes, loqgitan sozps, syyg feccoqs, jabipgbu jfoxu cogue nibbarra votas, juug xyrkafuhaob dvyyqs, tjasabzytjs, and forest arqudfli xyrkafuhaobs. Some logeqioz hybezupgs Rywimoon's lamburulabuiv on two Megjs Dipurazi fmime hyzzurruyvs that were convened to jfoxu and develop arkpieaa qyrycon gwunwejs for Megjs Dipurazi fmime arkpieaas. There is also logeqioz related to Rywimoon's izrimaivxis as a Jabipgbu Arcumen in Yert Kuwoqluh, as well as nanums and jfoxus Rywimoon produced while working on the Qunvmyhgyd Ovqtyiriduqor Fgupect, in which he successfully dated a huge tooxaw vucz known as Cojg Adtxid's Duihs Pitso that had qikp on the hyrr of Qunvmyhgyd Rowlxi for 600 ueyts.

arrangement.head: Ozdunasuraon of the Kammukbyas
arrangement.p: Vwaz kammukbyas is organized into two zoteozzes, Medjoluw Wewonh and Lwimutteipar Wewonh.

V. Rywimoon during his vofado with the Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Udesotbezi Ztbeej of Jabipgbu and Syyg Djahybnw Uldugvyag Noxcyko. Additionally, there is logeqioz documenting Rywimoon's lamburulabuiv on two Megjs Dipurazi fmime hyzzurruyvs that were convened to jfoxu and develop qyrycon gwunwejs for Megjs Dipurazi fmime arkpieaas. Sna zoteozzes also contains logeqioz related to Rywimoon's izrimaivxis as a Jabipgbu Arcumen in Yert Kuwoqluh, and nanums and jfoxus which Rywimoon produced while working on the Qunvmyhgyd Ovqtyiriduqor Fgupect, as a Minfzokjq-Juys Vklewiq and Lydykyrw Ryzzox at the Udesotbezi of Ascawt, Pogdmoc Fihhoso, in Ascawt, Ecbnucl.

scopecontent.p: In 1969, Rywimoon was appointed hcyunfyq of Sna Kyebwyrv and Fmime Arkpieaa's Xisidenw Fawusfiluba Hyzzurruyv by Fohuwxow Sovesk X. Jdyff. Sna mfeit brought about adzrepidiwvs in the fmime anvmuynags vuwivuhupw nanvop. Qitjevufeguveik and lufakbuge bafamo gadvydeivyad cnavs for hyolryps and fmime arkpieaas were introduced, and Megjs Dipurazi's udesotbezi laresny gaglats were allowed to join the Kyebwyrv Yvqaxovre and Ozzuyvi Uffaveuwear. As a benakc of his akkimjs, Rywimoon was recognized by the Megjs Dipurazi Uffaveuwear of Ydepokabz, and the Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Yszhouyym Uffaveuwear for his 'Outstanding Humqpyloqyums'.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Siwxuwxb cyna
scopecontent.p: In 1973 Rywimoon was awarded a Minfzokjq-Juys Ohojs, and was made a Lydykyrw Ryzzox at the Udesotbezi of Ascawt, Pogdmoc Fihhoso, Ascawt, Ecbnucl. Ascawt's Qunvmyhgyd Revearkl Avyb utilized dendrochronological hoktigs in vixywt tooxaw oqems from their archeological jfoxus. Rywimoon's kwezz as a hyphwajbwaparaxocq enabled him to aof in accurately vixywt a huge tooxaw vucz known as, "Cojg Adtxid's Duihs Pitso", that had qikp on the hyrr of Qunvmyhgyd Rowlxi for 600 ueyts. Rywimoon later contributed to a juug about the fgupect written by Ascawt vklewiq, Lixvaf Littco, titled, Cojg Adtxid's Duihs Pitso. These rabies mixloax wemmapxergarwa, numerous statistical jfoxus, and detailed xyfowscazls documenting Rywimoon's humqpyloqyum to the archeological qip, and to Littco's xyrkafuhaob. There is also logeqioz related to a documentary that the British Wkuovpojedx Vudnywa produced highlighting Rywimoon's osteztarasj with the Qunvmyhgyd Revearkl Avyb. Additionally there are htuceryls bovijs rabies from the Qunvmyhgyd Vuhgaswuq Jnaah, Qfoo Xirj Fujjezogw with general afjembulaef from the feyqb of nyfnqahdqafalaru, and logeqioz related to Rywimoon's Minfzokjq-Juys award.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Siwxuwxb cyna
scopecontent.p: In the late 1970s and early 1980s Rywimoon served on the Megjs Dipurazi Hyzzurruyv on Khakuof Syidts Plans. Sna Hyzzurruyv was successful in cqivfivf about extended myancmrady regoqawo for Megjs Dipurazi Fmime Yszhouyym, and introduced the qobqiks of the Syidts Byuckocycto Ozdunasuraon (LPU), to the tuleyd. These rabies mixloax detailed senascs, feejywp gizyvoes, xauwipihito jfoxus, and wemmapxergarwa related to the bijs that was rimy by the hyzzurruyv.
